queries.name: Invoice lines without invoice or service line item
queries.query: MATCH (n:InvoiceLine) WHERE NOT (n)<-[:HAS_INVOICE_LINE]-(:Invoice) OR NOT (n)-[:INVOICED]->(:ServiceLineItem) RETURN count(n)
queries.description: Invoice line should be linked to an invoice and a service line item.

queries.name: Invoice lines with missing properties
queries.query: MATCH (n:InvoiceLine) WHERE (n.billedType IS NULL OR n.billedType = "" OR n.amount IS NULL OR n.totalAmount IS NULL) RETURN count(n) as cnt
queries.description: Invoice line should have a billedType, amount and totalAmount.

queries.name: Invoice nodes wrong labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:INVOICE_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(n:Invoice) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'Invoice_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Invoice line nodes wrong labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:INVOICE_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(:Invoice)-[:HAS_SERVICE]->(n:InvoiceLine) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'InvoiceLine_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Duplicated scheduled invoices
queries.query: MATCH (i:Invoice)--(c:Contract) WHERE i.dryRun = true and i.preview = true WITH c.id as cid, i.periodStartDate as ipsd, count(i) as countInvoices WHERE countInvoices > 1 RETURN count(cid) AS cnt
queries.description: Check duplicated scheduled (dry run and preview = true) invoices for same contract and period start date

queries.name: Invoice without contract
queries.query: MATCH (n:Invoice) WHERE NOT (n)<-[:HAS_INVOICE]-(:Contract|DeletedContract) RETURN count(n) as cnt

queries.name: Invoice with missing properties
queries.query: MATCH (i:Invoice) WHERE i.dryRun IS NULL OR i.periodEndDate IS NULL OR i.periodStartDate IS NULL OR i.currency IS NULL OR i.currency = '' OR i.issuedDate IS NULL OR i.dueDate IS NULL OR i.preview IS NULL OR i.status IS NULL RETURN count(i)

queries.name: Invoice stuck in initialized status
queries.query: MATCH (i:Invoice) WHERE i.dryRun = false AND i.status = 'INITIALIZED' AND i.createdAt < datetime() - duration({minutes: 5}) RETURN count(i)

queries.name: Overdue invoices in due status
queries.query: MATCH (i:Invoice) WHERE i.dryRun = false AND i.status = 'DUE' AND date(i.dueDate) < date(datetime() - duration({days:1})) RETURN count(i)

queries.name: Contract nodes with wrong labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:CONTRACT_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(n:Contract) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'Contract_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Contracts without organization
queries.query: MATCH (c:Contract) WHERE NOT (c)<-[:HAS_CONTRACT]-(:Organization) return count(c)

queries.name: Multiple organizations share same contract
queries.query: MATCH (org:Organization)-[:HAS_CONTRACT]->(c:Contract) with c, count(org) as size_orgs where size_orgs > 1 return count(c)

queries.name: Contracts with wrong end status
queries.query: MATCH (c:Contract) WHERE ((c.status <> 'ENDED' OR c.status IS NULL) AND date(c.endedAt) < date()) OR (c.status = 'ENDED' AND (c.endedAt IS NULL OR date(c.endedAt) > date()))  RETURN count(c)

queries.name: Contracts with wrong draft status
queries.query: MATCH (c:Contract) WHERE (c.status ='DRAFT' AND c.approved = true) OR (c.status <> 'DRAFT' AND c.approve = false) RETURN count(c)

queries.name: Contracts with wrong scheduled status
queries.query: MATCH (c:Contract) WHERE c.status = 'SCHEDULED' AND date(c.serviceStartedAt) < date() RETURN count(c)

queries.name: Contracts with wrong out of contract status
queries.query: MATCH (c:Contract)-[:ACTIVE_RENEWAL]-(op:RenewalOpportunity) WHERE c.status = 'OUT_OF_CONTRACT' AND (c.autoRenew = true OR op.approved = true OR date(op.renewedAt) > date())  RETURN count(c)

queries.name: Contracts without opportunity with wrong live status
queries.query: MATCH (c:Contract) WHERE NOT (c)-[:ACTIVE_RENEWAL]->(:RenewalOpportunity) AND c.status = 'LIVE' AND (date(c.serviceStartedAt) > date() OR c.approved = false OR c.approved IS NULL) RETURN count(c)

queries.name: Contracts with renewals with wrong live status
queries.query: MATCH (c:Contract)-[:ACTIVE_RENEWAL]->(op:RenewalOpportunity) WhERE c.status = 'LIVE' AND (c.approved = false OR c.approved IS NULL OR date(op.renewedAt) < date()) RETURN count(c)

queries.name: Organizations with wrong nodes labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:ORGANIZATION_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(o:Organization) WHERE size(labels(o)) <> 2 OR NOT 'Organization_'+t.name in labels(o) return count(o)

queries.name: Multiple organizations share same domain
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:ORGANIZATION_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(org:Organization)-[:HAS_DOMAIN]->(d:Domain) with t, d, count(org) as size_orgs where size_orgs > 1 return count(d)

queries.name: Organization with missing properties
queries.query: MATCH (o:Organization) WHERE o.hide IS NULL OR o.createdAt IS NULL RETURN count(o)

queries.name: Organization derived next renewal date in past
queries.query: MATCH (org:Organization) OPTIONAL MATCH (org)--(c:Contract) WITH org, collect(c) as contracts WHERE size(contracts) > 0 AND ALL(c IN contracts WHERE c.status <> 'OUT_OF_CONTRACT') AND date(org.derivedNextRenewalAt) < date() RETURN count(org)
queries.description: Organization with derived next renewal date in the past. If organization has multiple contracts, all contracts should be in status different than 'OUT_OF_CONTRACT'.

queries.name: Organization derived next renewal date not updated
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:ORGANIZATION_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(org:Organization)-[:HAS_CONTRACT]-(c:Contract)-[:ACTIVE_RENEWAL]->(op:RenewalOpportunity) WITH t, org, collect(c) as contracts, collect(op) as ops WHERE ALL(c IN contracts WHERE c.status = 'LIVE') UNWIND ops as op WITH t, org, min(op.renewedAt) AS minOpRenewalDate WHERE date(org.derivedNextRenewalAt) < date(minOpRenewalDate) RETURN count(org)
queries.description: Organization with derived next renewal date is before minimal opportunity next renewal. If organization has multiple contracts, all contracts should be in status different than 'OUT_OF_CONTRACT'.

queries.name: Not enriched organizations
queries.query: MATCH (o:Organization)--(d:Domain) WHERE o.hide = false AND o.enrichedAt IS NULL AND (d.enrichRequestedAt IS NULL OR NOT d.enrichedAt IS NULL) AND (o.techDomainCheckedAt < datetime()+duration({hours:24}) OR o.techDomainCheckedAt IS NULL) return count(o)

queries.name: Check user nodes labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:USER_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(n:User) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'User_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Emails shared between users
queries.query: MATCH (u:User)-[r1:HAS]->(e:Email)<-[r2:HAS]-(n:User) WHERE u <> n return count(e)

queries.name: Domain nodes with missing domain property
queries.query: MATCH (d:Domain) WHERE d.domain IS NULL or d.domain = '' RETURN count(d)

queries.name: Incorrect domain capitalization
queries.query: MATCH (d:Domain) WHERE d.domain <> toLower(d.domain) RETURN count(d)

queries.name: Tenant nodes with missing mandatory properties
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant) WHERE t.name IS NULL or t.name = '' RETURN count(t)

queries.name: Missing link with tenant
queries.query: WITH ["Tenant","InteractionSession","JobRole","Domain","Social","TimelineEvent","CustomField","AlternateOrganization","Calendar","ServiceLineItem","Opportunity","OrganizationPlanMilestone","MasterPlanMilestone","InvoiceLine","Attachment","Player","AlternateContact","TechnicalNode","AlternateCustomField","Comment","AlternateUser","Country","State","Meeting"] as labels MATCH (n) WHERE NOT ANY(label in labels(n) WHERE label IN labels OR label contains 'deleted') AND NOT (n)--(:Tenant)  RETURN count(n)
queries.description: All nodes should be linked to a tenant except for the listed labels.

queries.name: Single TenantSettings per tenant
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)-->(ts:TenantSettings) with t, count(ts) as cnt where cnt > 1 return count(t)

queries.name: Single TenantMetadata per tenant
queries.query: match (t:Tenant)-->(tm:TenantMetadata) with t, count(tm) as cnt where cnt > 1 return count(t)

queries.name: Check email nodes labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:EMAIL_ADDRESS_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(n:Email) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'Email_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Cross tenants email link
queries.query: MATCH (t1:Tenant)--(n:User|Contact|Organization)--(:Email)--(t2:Tenant) where t1.name <> t2.name return count(n)

queries.name: Check phone number nodes labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:PHONE_NUMBER_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(n:PhoneNumber) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'PhoneNumber_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Cross tenants phone number link
queries.query: MATCH (t1:Tenant)--(n:User|Contact|Organization)--(:PhoneNumber)--(t2:Tenant) where t1.name <> t2.name return count(n)

queries.name: Check contact nodes labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:CONTACT_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(n:Contact) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'Contact_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Check location nodes labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:LOCATION_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(n:Location) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'Location_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Tag nodes with wrong labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:TAG_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(n:Tag) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'Tag_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Duplicate tags
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:TAG_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(tag:Tag) with t.name as tenant, tag.name as tag_name, count(tag) as size_tags where size_tags > 1 return count(tag_name) as cnt

queries.name: Check service line items nodes labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)<-[:CONTRACT_BELONGS_TO_TENANT]-(:Contract)-[:HAS_SERVICE]->(n:ServiceLineItem) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'ServiceLineItem_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: Service line items without contract
queries.query: MATCH (n:ServiceLineItem) WHERE NOT (n)<-[:HAS_SERVICE]-(:Contract|DeletedContract) RETURN count(n) as cnt

queries.name: Check tenant billing profile labels
queries.query: MATCH (t:Tenant)-[:HAS_BILLING_PROFILE]->(n:TenantBillingProfile) WHERE size(labels(n)) <> 2 OR NOT 'TenantBillingProfile_'+t.name in labels(n) return count(n)

queries.name: JobRoles without linked contact or user
queries.query: MATCH (j:JobRole) WHERE NOT (j)--(:Contact|User) RETURN count(j)

queries.name: Comments without parent
queries.query: MATCH (c:Comment) WHERE NOT (c)-[:COMMENTED]->() return count(c)

queries.name: Multiple active renewal opportunities for same contract
queries.query: MATCH (c:Contract)-[:ACTIVE_RENEWAL]->(op:Opportunity) WITH c, count(op) AS sizeOps WHERE sizeOps > 1 RETURN count(c)

queries.name: Multiple open renewal opportunities for same contract
queries.query: MATCH (c:Contract)-[:HAS_OPPORTUNITY]->(op:RenewalOpportunity) WHERE op.internalStage='OPEN' WITH c, count(op) AS sizeOps WHERE sizeOps > 1 RETURN count(c)

queries.name: Next opportunity renewal date in the past
queries.query: MATCH (c:Contract)-[:ACTIVE_RENEWAL]->(op:RenewalOpportunity) WHERE NOT c.status IN ['OUT_OF_CONTRACT','DRAFT'] AND date(op.renewedAt) < date(datetime()) return count(op)

queries.name: Orphan nodes
queries.query: MATCH (n) WHERE NOT (n)--() AND NOT n:Country AND NOT n:Domain AND NOT n:TechnicalNode AND NOT n:Attachment return count(n)

queries.name: Check synced with event store
queries.query: MATCH (n:User|Organization) where n.syncedWithEventStore is null or n.syncedWithEventStore = false return count(n)

queries.name: Check source fields
queries.query:
WITH ["Tenant","ExternalSystem","Domain","InteractionSession","AlternateOrganization","Action","TenantSettings","MergedOrganization","AlternateContact","TechnicalNode","CustomField","AlternateCustomField","TenantMetadata","AlternateUser","Tag","CustomFieldTemplate","State","Player"] as labels
MATCH (n) WHERE NOT ANY(label in labels(n) WHERE label IN labels) 
WITH n 
WHERE n.source IS NULL OR n.sourceOfTruth IS NULL OR n.appSource IS NULL OR n.source = '' OR n.sourceOfTruth = '' or n.appSource = ''
RETURN count(n)

queries.name: Check ServiceLineItem data consistency
queries.query:
CALL {
    MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem)<-[:HAS_SERVICE]-(c:Contract) WITH sli, count(c) AS sizeContracts WHERE sizeContracts <> 1 RETURN count(sli) AS cnt 
    UNION ALL 
    MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem) WHERE sli.endedAt < sli.startedAt RETURN count(sli) as cnt 
    UNION ALL 
    MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem) WHERE sli.createdAt is null OR sli.updatedAt is null OR sli.startedAt is null OR sli.billed is null OR sli.billed = '' OR sli.parentId is null OR sli.parentId = '' return count(sli) as cnt 
    UNION ALL 
    MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem) WHERE sli.billed IS NOT NULL AND NOT sli.billed IN ['','MONTHLY','ANNUALLY','QUARTERLY', 'USAGE','ONCE'] RETURN count(sli) as cnt
    UNION ALL
    MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem) WHERE apoc.meta.cypher.type(sli.price) <> 'FLOAT' RETURN count(sli) as cnt
    UNION ALL
    MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem) WHERE apoc.meta.cypher.type(sli.quantity) <> 'INTEGER' RETURN count(sli) as cnt
    UNION ALL
    MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem) WHERE sli.endedAt IS NULL WITH sli.parentId AS parent, count(sli) AS size WHERE size > 1 RETURN count(parent) as cnt
    UNION ALL 
    MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem) WHERE sli.endedAt IS NOT NULL WITH sli.parentId AS parent, sli.endedAt AS endedAt, count(sli) AS size WHERE size > 1 RETURN count(parent) as cnt
    UNION ALL
    MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem) WITH sli.parentId AS parent, sli.startedAt AS startedAt, count(sli) AS size WHERE size > 1 RETURN count(parent) as cnt
    UNION ALL
    MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem) WHERE sli.endedAt IS NOT NULL MATCH (other:ServiceLineItem {parentId:sli.parentId}) WHERE sli.id <> other.id AND sli.startedAt < other.startedAt WITH sli.parentId AS parent, sli.endedAt AS currentEnd, collect(other.startedAt) AS otherStarts WHERE size(otherStarts)>0 AND NOT currentEnd IN (otherStarts) RETURN count(parent) AS cnt
    UNION ALL
    MATCH (sli:ServiceLineItem) WHERE sli.isCanceled = true and sli.endedAt IS NULL RETURN count(sli) AS cnt
} RETURN sum(cnt)
queries.description: Checks: 1 - Service line item with wrong number of contracts. 2 - Service line item with wrong endedAt date. 3 - Service line item with missing properties. 4 - Service line item with wrong billed value. 5 - Service line item with wrong price type. 6 - Service line item with wrong quantity type. 7 - Multiple active versions per single parent. 8 - Multiple versions with same end date. 9 - Multiple versions with same start date. 10 - End date not matching start date of other versions. 11 - Canceled service line item without end date.

queries.name: Check organization derived data consistency
queries.query:
CALL {MATCH (org:Organization) WHERE org.derivedRenewalLikelihood IS NOT NULL AND NOT org.derivedRenewalLikelihood IN ['','ZERO','LOW','MEDIUM','HIGH'] RETURN count(org) as cnt
     UNION ALL
     MATCH (org:Organization) WHERE org.derivedRenewalLikelihood IS NULL AND NOT org.derivedRenewalLikelihood IS NULL RETURN count(org) as cnt
     UNION ALL MATCH (org:Organization)--(c:Contract)-[:ACTIVE_RENEWAL]->(op:RenewalOpportunity) WHERE (org.renewalForecastMaxArr IS NULL OR org.renewalForecastMaxArr = 0) AND (op.maxAmount > 0) return count(org) AS cnt
} RETURN sum(cnt)
queries.description: Checks: 2 - Organizations with wrong derivedRenewalLikelihood value. 3 - Organization with renewal likelihood but without renewal date. 4 - Organizations with missing ARR

queries.name: Check organization data consistency
queries.description: Checks: 1 - Organizations with wrong onboardingStatus value.

queries.name: Check renewal opportunity data consistency
queries.description: Checks: 1 - Renewal opportunity with wrong renewedAt date and open internal stage. 2 - Renewal opportunity with wrong renewalLikelihood value.

queries.name: Check contract and invoice link consistency
queries.query:
CALL {
    MATCH (c:Contract)-[:HAS_INVOICE]->(i:Invoice) WHERE i.dryRun = false AND date(coalesce(c.nextInvoiceDate, c.invoicingStartDate, datetime())) <= date(i.periodEndDate) RETURN count(i) as cnt
    UNION ALL
    MATCH (c:Contract)--(t:Tenant)--(ts:TenantSettings) WHERE (ts.invoicingPostpaid = false OR ts.invoicingPostpaid IS NULL) AND c.techInvoicingStartedAt IS NOT NULL WITH c OPTIONAL MATCH (c)-[:HAS_INVOICE]->(i:Invoice) WHERE i.dryRun = false and i.createdAt > c.techInvoicingStartedAt-duration({hours: 1}) WITH i,c WHERE i IS NULL RETURN count(c) as cnt
    UNION ALL
    MATCH (c:Contract)--(t:Tenant)--(ts:TenantSettings) WHERE ts.invoicingPostpaid = true AND c.techInvoicingStartedAt IS NOT NULL AND coalesce(c.nextInvoiceDate, c.invoicingStartDate)+duration({days: CASE WHEN c.billingCycle='MONTHLY' THEN 31 ELSE CASE WHEN c.billingCycle='QUARTERLY' THEN 92 ELSE CASE WHEN c.billingCycle='ANNUALLY' THEN 366 ELSE 0 END END END}) < c.techInvoicingStartedAt WITH c OPTIONAL MATCH (c)-[:HAS_INVOICE]->(i:Invoice) WHERE i.dryRun = FALSE AND i.createdAt > c.techInvoicingStartedAt-duration({hours: 1}) WITH i,c WHERE i IS NULL RETURN count(c) as cnt
} RETURN sum(cnt)
queries.description: Checks: 1 - Check that contract next invoice date is not before invoice period end date. 2 - Check that prepaid contract with techInvoicingStartedAt date has non dry run invoice. 3 - Check that postpaid contract with techInvoicingStartedAt date has non dry run invoice.
